summary: TL*  THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 BUICK RENDEZVOUS. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE TRAVELING APPROXIMATELY 50 MPH, THE VEHICLE  STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT HAD ADJUSTED A WIRE IN THE ELECTRICAL BOX AND WAS ABLE RESTART THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT WAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO START THE VEHICLE WITHOUT ADJUSTING A WIRE IN THE FUZE BOX INTERMITTENTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A REPAIR SHOP WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL PUMP ASSEMBLY AND THE FUSE BOX NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 80,000.
